rleon, also known as Arleon the Unforgiven, was a powerful ogre warlord living in Neverwinter in ancient times.
Arleon was a powerful warrior who in life killed many strong opponents. He was killed only by the combined efforts of ten valorous heroes and subsequently interred in Neverdeath Graveyard
In 1479 DR, the emissary Xivros, a Red Wizard of Thay under Valindra Shadowmantle, decided to raise him as an undead to guide Valindras undead army in the conquest of the city. Xivros succeeded in his ritual and Arleon the Unforgiven became a wight. However, soon after an adventurer sent by Sergeant Knox to stop the plot arrived and fought and defeated the ogre wight.
